H0.text: Disaronno is an 'amaretto' liqueur with a characteristic bitter-almond taste, however it doesn't contain any nuts at all; from the kernel of which fruit does the flavour come. Apricot

A4.text: Oil made from apricot kernels is safe for human consumption without treatment because amygdalin is not oil soluble.
